mapper.select: SELECT PD.ID , PD.NAME , PD.CHIHO , PD.SHUTO_ID FROM PPOG_DISTRICTS PD WHERE PD.DEL_FLG = 'approved' ORDER BY PD.ID

SELECT PD.ID , PD.NAME , PC.NAME AS CITY_NAME , PD.CHIHO , PD.SHUTO_ID FROM PPOG_DISTRICTS PD LEFT JOIN PPOG_CITIES PC ON PC.ID = PD.SHUTO_ID WHERE PD.DEL_FLG = 'approved' AND ( PD.NAME LIKE #{keyword,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} OR PC.NAME LIKE #{keyword,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} OR PD.CHIHO LIKE #{keyword,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} ) ORDER BY PD.ID OFFSET #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY
